content: hearts go round designer aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2 designs©2011 size ​8 heart tip to tip ​hook ​ g/4 5mm ​yarn ​ peaches n cream cotton yarn in 1 or 2 colors ______________________________________________________________ notes​ ​ ​ bobble​l​d print​ ​ repeated in pattern ​sts​ work in next st/chsp ​join ​ ​join w/slip_stitch in beg st unless otherwise stated ___________________________________________________________ abbreviations & stitches used beg=​beginning chain=​chain slip_stitch=​slip_stitch single_crochet=​single_crochet space=​spaces skip​=skip w/=​with double_crochet=​double_crochet st s =​stitch es lps=​loops bl=back loop if using 2 colors start with a round 1 ch4 11dc in 4th chain from hook join 12dc aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2designs ©copyright 2011 all rights reserved hearts go round © 1 round 2 ch3 double_crochet in same st 2dc in each st around join in bl 24dc round 3 working in bls for this round ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each bl around join 24sc round 4 repeat round 2 join in bl 48dc round 5 repeat round 3 if using 2 colors pull through color b in join 48sc round 6 ch3 2dc in same st *ch1 skip one st double_crochet in next 3sts ch1 skip one st* 3dc in next st repeat around join 48dc round 7 ch3 2dc in same st double_crochet in next st 3dc in next st *ch1 skip space double_crochet in next 3sts ch1* 3dc in next st double_crochet in next st 3dc in next st 7x repeat *to* once join 80dc round 8 skip next st 4dc in next st slip_stitch in next st 4dc in next st skip next double_crochet slip_stitch in next st single_crochet in next 5sts slip_stitch in next st skip next double_crochet repeat around join 64dc 40sc personal use/print only no pattern reproductions selling or copying allowed see my designs & videos on my blog ​ ​http //myblueangels blogspot com/ download pattern on ravelry ​http //www ravelry com/designers/aurora­suominen my
